nodes.documentation: @title Interface for security token proxy deployment
nodes.name: ISTFactory
deployToken
setLogicContract

nodes.documentation:
@notice Used to upgrade a token
@param _maxModuleType maximum module type enumeration
nodes.name: upgradeToken
updateDefaultTransferManager
updateDefaultDataStore

nodes.documentation: @title Interface for security token proxy deployment
nodes.name: ISTFactory
deployToken
setLogicContract

nodes.documentation:
@notice Used to upgrade a token
@param _maxModuleType maximum module type enumeration
nodes.name: upgradeToken
updateDefaultTransferManager
updateDefaultDataStore

params._decimals: is the number of decimals of the Security Token
params._divisible: whether the token is divisible or not
params._issuer: is the owner of the Security Token
params._name: is the name of the Security token
params._symbol: is the symbol of the Security Token
params._tokenDetails: is the off-chain data associated with the Security Token
params._treasuryWallet: Ethereum address which will holds the STs.

params._initializationData: Initialization data that used to intialize value in the securityToken
params._logicContract: Address of deployed module logic contract referenced from proxy
params._upgradeData: Data to be passed in call to upgradeToAndCall when a token upgrades its module

updateDefaultDataStore(address).details: Setting this to address(0) means don't deploy a default data store

params._dataStoreFactory: Address of new default data store factory

updateDefaultTransferManager(address).details: Setting this to address(0) means don't deploy a default TM

params._transferManagerFactory: Address of new default transfer manager factory

devdoc.title: Interface for security token proxy deployment

deployToken(string,string,uint8,string,a.notice: Deploys the token and adds default modules like permission manager and transfer manager. Future versions of the proxy can attach different modules or pass some other paramters.

setLogicContract(string,address,bytes,by.notice: Used to set a new token logic contract

updateDefaultDataStore(address).notice: Used to set a new default data store

updateDefaultTransferManager(address).notice: Used to set a new default transfer manager
